# release-manager

> Manage complete release lifecycle (version, changelog, publish, deploy)

## Quick Reference

- **Type**: OSSA Agent v0.4.0
- **Category**: release
- **Manifest**: release-manager.ossa.yaml

## Overview

Manage complete release lifecycle for OSSA agents:
- Semantic versioning (major/minor/patch)
- Changelog generation (Keep a Changelog format)
- npm/Docker/K8s publishing
- GitLab/GitHub release creation

## Related

- Main OSSA documentation: /README.md
- Agent manifest: ./release-manager.ossa.yaml
- Agent details: ./AGENTS.md
